field.label: Enable SEO Suite Lite
field.comment: Enable or disable the entire SEO Suite Lite module.

field.label: Enable Meta Tags Templates
field.comment: Enable or disable meta tags templates functionality.

field.label: Enable Meta Tags Override
field.comment: Enable meta tags templates to override existing meta tags set in entities.

field.label: Override Only Empty Meta Tags
field.comment: If set to Yes, templates will only be applied when meta tags are empty in the entity. If set to No, templates will override all meta tags.

field.label: Override Meta Title
field.comment: Override existing meta title even if it's already set.

field.label: Override Meta Description
field.comment: Override existing meta description even if it's already set.

field.label: Override Meta Keywords
field.comment: Override existing meta keywords even if it's already set.

field.label: Enable Canonical URLs
field.comment: Enable or disable canonical URLs functionality.

field.label: Enable for Products
field.comment: Enable or disable canonical URLs for product pages.

field.label: Product Canonical URL Type
field.comment: Select the type of canonical URL to use for products.

field.label: Enable for Categories
field.comment: Enable or disable canonical URLs for category pages.

field.label: Use Canonical for Category Pagination
field.comment: If enabled, canonical URLs will be used for paginated category pages.

field.label: Category Pagination Canonical Type
field.comment: Select the type of canonical URL to use for paginated category pages.

field.label: Use Canonical for Category Filters
field.comment: If enabled, canonical URLs will be used for filtered category pages.

field.label: Exclude URL Patterns
field.comment: Enter URL patterns to exclude from canonical tags (one per line). Use * as a wildcard.

field.label: Exclude Invisible Products
field.comment: If enabled, canonical tags will not be added to products with 'Not Visible Individually' visibility.

field.label: Exclude Anchor Categories
field.comment: If enabled, canonical tags will not be added to anchor categories.

field.label: Excluded Product Types
field.comment: Select product types that should not have canonical tags.

field.label: Excluded CMS Pages
field.comment: Select CMS pages that should not have canonical tags.

field.label: Enable Canonical Cache
field.comment: Enable or disable caching for canonical URLs. Recommended for performance.

field.label: Canonical Cache Lifetime
field.comment: Cache lifetime in seconds. Default: 86400 (24 hours)

field.label: Enable Friendly URLs for Filters
field.comment: Enable or disable friendly URLs for category filters.

field.label: URL Pattern
field.comment: Select the pattern for friendly URLs.

field.label: Filter Separator
field.comment: Character to use as separator between filters.

field.label: Value Separator
field.comment: Character to use as separator between attribute and value.

field.label: Multi-Value Separator
field.comment: Character to use as separator between multiple values of the same attribute.

field.label: Attribute URL Map
field.comment: Map attribute codes to friendly URL keys. Format: attribute_code=friendly_name (one per line)

field.label: Enable Structured Data
field.comment: Enable or disable structured data generation (JSON-LD format).

field.label: Enable for Products
field.comment: Generate structured data for product pages.

field.label: Enable for Categories
field.comment: Generate structured data for category pages.

field.label: Enable Organization Data
field.comment: Include organization information in structured data.

field.label: Enable Website Data
field.comment: Include website information in structured data.

field.label: Include Reviews
field.comment: Include product reviews in structured data.

field.label: Enable Structured Data Cache
field.comment: Enable caching for structured data. Recommended for performance.

field.label: Cache Lifetime
field.comment: Cache lifetime in seconds. Default: 86400 (24 hours)

field.label: Include Product List in Categories
field.comment: Include product list in category structured data.

field.label: Category Product Limit
field.comment: Maximum number of products to include in category structured data.

group.label: Organization Information
group.comment: This section requires 'Enable Structured Data' and 'Enable Organization Data' to be set to Yes.

field.label: Organization Name
field.comment: Your organization/company name.

field.label: Organization Type
field.comment: Select the type of organization.

field.label: Logo URL
field.comment: Full URL to your organization logo.

field.label: Description
field.comment: Brief description of your organization.

field.label: Founding Date
field.comment: Date when the organization was founded (YYYY-MM-DD).

field.label: Tax ID
field.comment: Organization tax identification number.

field.label: VAT ID
field.comment: VAT identification number.

field.label: Country
field.comment: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., US, GB, PL).

field.label: Available Languages
field.comment: Comma-separated list of ISO 639-1 language codes (e.g., en,pl,de).

field.label: Area Served
field.comment: Comma-separated list of countries or regions served.

group.label: Website Information
group.comment: This section requires 'Enable Structured Data' and 'Enable Website Data' to be set to Yes.

field.label: Alternate Name
field.comment: Alternative name for your website (e.g., commonly used abbreviation).

field.label: Enable Sitelinks Searchbox
field.comment: Enable Google Sitelinks Searchbox for your website.

field.label: Search URL Pattern
field.comment: Custom search URL pattern. Use {base_url} and {search_term} as placeholders.

group.label: Product Attribute Mapping
group.comment: This section requires 'Enable Structured Data' and 'Enable for Products' to be set to Yes.

field.label: Brand Attribute
field.comment: Select the attribute to use for product brand.

field.label: Model Attribute
field.comment: Select the attribute to use for product model.

field.label: GTIN-8 Attribute
field.comment: Select the attribute to use for GTIN-8 (8-digit barcode).

field.label: GTIN-13/EAN Attribute
field.comment: Select the attribute to use for GTIN-13/EAN (13-digit barcode).

field.label: GTIN-14 Attribute
field.comment: Select the attribute to use for GTIN-14 (14-digit barcode).

field.label: MPN Attribute
field.comment: Select the attribute to use for Manufacturer Part Number.

field.label: Condition Attribute
field.comment: Select the attribute to use for product condition (new/used/refurbished).

field.label: Additional Property Mappings
field.comment: Map additional product attributes to schema.org properties. Format: property_name=attribute_code (one per line).

field.label: Custom Attribute Mappings
field.comment: Advanced: Custom schema.org field mappings in JSON format.

field.label: Enable XML Sitemap
field.comment: Enable or disable XML sitemap generation.

field.label: Sitemap Path
field.comment: Path relative to Magento root directory where sitemap files will be stored. Default: media/maps/

field.label: Enable Gzip Compression
field.comment: Compress sitemap files using gzip to reduce size.

field.label: Cron Schedule
field.comment: Cron expression for automatic generation. Default: 0 2 * * * (daily at 2 AM)

field.label: Ping Search Engines
field.comment: Automatically notify search engines after sitemap generation.

field.label: Enable Hreflang Tags
field.comment: Include hreflang tags for multilingual sitemaps.

field.label: Error Notifications
field.comment: Send email notifications when sitemap generation fails.

field.label: Enable Products in Sitemap
field.comment: Include products in sitemap generation.

field.label: Change Frequency
field.comment: How frequently product pages are likely to change.

field.label: Priority
field.comment: Priority of product pages relative to other URLs (0.0 to 1.0).

field.label: Include Product Images
field.comment: Include product images in sitemap entries.

field.label: Exclude Out of Stock Products
field.comment: Exclude out of stock products from sitemap.

field.label: Excluded Product Types
field.comment: Product types to exclude from sitemap.

field.label: Exclude Invisible Products
field.comment: Exclude products with 'Not Visible Individually' visibility.

field.label: Enable Categories in Sitemap
field.comment: Include categories in sitemap generation.

field.label: Change Frequency
field.comment: How frequently category pages are likely to change.

field.label: Priority
field.comment: Priority of category pages relative to other URLs (0.0 to 1.0).

field.label: Exclude Anchor Categories
field.comment: Exclude anchor categories from sitemap.

field.label: Exclude Inactive Categories
field.comment: Exclude inactive categories from sitemap.

field.label: Maximum Category Depth
field.comment: Maximum category depth to include (0 = no limit).

field.label: Enable CMS Pages in Sitemap
field.comment: Include CMS pages in sitemap generation.

field.label: Change Frequency
field.comment: How frequently CMS pages are likely to change.

field.label: Priority
field.comment: Priority of CMS pages relative to other URLs (0.0 to 1.0).

field.label: Excluded Page Identifiers
field.comment: Comma-separated list of page identifiers to exclude from sitemap.

field.label: Exclude System Pages
field.comment: Exclude system pages (404, cookies, etc.) from sitemap.

field.label: Enable Additional Links in Sitemap
field.comment: Include additional custom links in sitemap generation.

field.label: Change Frequency
field.comment: How frequently additional links are likely to change.

field.label: Priority
field.comment: Priority of additional links relative to other URLs (0.0 to 1.0).

field.label: Custom Links
field.comment: Custom URLs to include in sitemap (one per line). Format: URL|priority|changefreq
